name: Graveyard Shift (itch) (CFHM)
description:
Entry for the GDTV 2022 Game Jam.
Theme - Death Is Only The Beginning

Controls - Click and drag

The dead have to go somewhere. Keeping a cemetery neat and orderly can be challenging, especially if you have to keep pesky graverobbers from stealing your good bones!

Connect 3 or more matching icons to turn them into dirt. Surround identical pieces to turn them into bones. Clear Dirt and Bones by connecting them to or dropping them to the bottom of the board. 

Public Repo - github

Credits:

Design, Programming, Art, Font - CFHM
Music - "Clock Tower" by nosoapradio.us
SFX - pmsfx.com
